QuestData.Title: Adapt, Improve, Overcome!
QuestData.Description:
Izira Gearsworn is still alive, she is Rustbolt's strongest fighter, but her legs are broken. If we're going to survive I need parts to repair and upgrade her.
There are machines all over with parts we can salvage. With some perseverance we should be able to fix Izira's legs.
Help me obtain the following parts.
QuestData.LogDescription: $1oa Pristine Hound Bolts, $2oa Steel Tibia XS, and $3oa Machined Heel Nut.
